content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position 0,0 to 4,4)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at position (0,0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2,0)
- Furnace 3 at position (4,4)
All furnaces have coal fuel and are set up for iron plate smelting

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position 6.5,11.5 to 12.5,11.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at position (6.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5,11.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at position (9.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at position (11.5,11.5)
- Output wooden chest at position (12.5,11.5) containing 47 electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5,24.5 to -2.5,24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5,24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water at positions (-9.5,23.5), (-8.5,23.5), (-8.5,22.5), (-7.5,22.5)
- Boiler at position (-7.0,24.5)
- Steam pipe at position (-5.5,24.5)
- Steam engine at position (-2.5,24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting various parts of the factory

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Lab Placement and Access
- Cannot place lab at occupied position (0.5,28.5)
- Issues accessing lab entity - ensure proper entity retrieval method is used

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Monitor coal levels in inventory before attempting to insert into boiler/furnaces
- Keep track of ingredient requirements for electronic circuit production (iron plates and copper cables)

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check if target position is free before attempting to place new entities
- Remove existing entities if you need to place something in an occupied position

### API Usage Errors
- Ensure proper entity retrieval methods are used when accessing entities on the map
- Verify entity exists at target position before attempting operations on it
